thread.title: Peter in Seattle, WA (USA)
thread.title_full: Backcountry Gear reviewed by Peter in Seattle, WA (USA)

author: Peter in Seattle, WA (USA)
title: Peter in Seattle, WA (USA)
text: 4 star because i just bought and used it a few times, it is quite comfortable so far. Been through light rain and seen water repellent which is nice for Seattle region. Light and packable should it taken off during mountain hike. My opinion it might be good for inner wear for the winter back country adventure.
